title: queue bugging out
body:
I have queued for normal draft and every time at about 50-60s in i get an abandoned queue waning. However the pop up to accept the queue pop never came up. It happened multiple times now i have a queue dodge timer. 

Please help

replies.body: this happened to me as well. keeps on saying that i have not accepted numerous games. won't let me connect.{{champion:31}}
